title: Ep. 41: Ashley Spivey Co-Hosts the 99 Percent Mine Book Club!
itunes:title: Ep. 41: Ashley Spivey Co-Hosts the 99 Percent Mine Book Club!
description:
In this episode, we are joined by our favorite fellow book lover, Ashley Spivey, to talk about this month's bookclub pick, 99 Percent Mine by Sally Thorne. Ashley runs a Facebook group bookclub with over 11,000 members, co-hosts the podcast He Said She Said, AND was on The Bachelor! We can't think of a better fit to help us talk about this month's book. Readers beware... by the end of this episode, you may just have a cart full of new books because Ashley's recommendations are endless!

Also in this episode, Ashley is taking submissions for her book idea, Becca has injured herself (any doctors out there know what she's done?!), and Grace indulges in top-shelf mascara.We are also stoked to announce that Casey Balsham will be opening the live show with stand-up comedy!

Because Ashley is amazing and we had so many questions for her, we are releasing a BONUS episode next Monday where we will talk all things books and The Bachelor. You can follow @ashleyspivey here and join her book club here!

Sponsors:

Care/Of: Take 50% off your first month of personalized vitamins by going to takecareof.com and entering code BOP50 at checkout.

Modern Fertility: Get $20 off your first kit by going to modernfertility.com/bop 

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
